title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.28 - Observation decks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.28 - Observation decks

State Regulations

The fee for admission upon the observation decks at La

Guardia Airport shall be 10 cents; provided, however, that there shall be no
fee for such admission in the case of children under 12 years of age
accompanied by an adult and that such children shall not be admitted upon such
spectator promenades unless so accompanied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1263.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
